org.threadly.litesockets.utils

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.litesockets.utils.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    SimpleUtil functions for IO operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IOUtils.ClientInputStream
      This creates an InputStream from a client.
      static class  IOUtils.ClientOutputStream
      This creates an OutputStream from a client.

      static int DEFAULT_CLIENT_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE
      Default max buffer size (64k).
      static int DEFAULT_CLIENT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE

      Minimum allowed readBuffer (4k).

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_CLIENT_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_CLIENT_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE
        Default max buffer size (64k). Read and write buffers are independent of each other.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_CLIENT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_CLIENT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE
        When we hit the minimum read buffer size we will create a new one of this size (64k).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MIN_CLIENT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_MIN_CLIENT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE
        Minimum allowed readBuffer (4k). If the readBuffer is lower then this we will create a new one.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY

        public static final byte[] EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY

      • EMPTY_BYTEBUFFER

        public static final java.nio.ByteBuffer EMPTY_BYTEBUFFER
        Simple empty ByteBuffer to use when passing a ByteBuffer of 0 length.

      • FINISHED_LONG_FUTURE

        public static final org.threadly.concurrent.future.ListenableFuture<java.lang.Long> FINISHED_LONG_FUTURE

        Another implementation of a silent closing function.
        Parameters:
        closer - Closable to invoke Closeable.close() on
